body: "why the fuck am I translating this" poor motherfucker translated 60 pages. what a god

10/10  


I liked the actions and the summary of this fanbook!
This reminds me of a puzzle ...

“Why am I translating this?”
HE’S SELF AWARE

I come to this site on this fateful night, hoping to find something to good. I scroll down on the first page, expecting to see many different characters, but one catches my eye. It's Professor Layton! My mind is filled with questions, and I let my curiosity get the better of me. I read the story, and head back to the front page afterwords, thinking it was all over. This was until I noticed that the front page was filled with different Professor Layton stories. I started at my screen in confusion. "What?" I say as more questions fill me brain, "Who is responsible for this?" I look at each artist's name and find that each story is by a different one. I could not believe that it was a group of people, all having Layton stories on the front page at once! What had happened to humanity? We have strayed so far from god, that now, I fear we cannot go back.
GASP i didn't know this existed, very nice
